abstract: Thai police seize explosives in suburban apartment building as part of ongoing investigation into deadly bombing of Bangkok shrine that killed 20 people; Thai military government has decreed that bombing cannot be referred to as terrorism and has forbidden any mention of possible connection to July repatriation of over 100 ethnic Uighurs, the leading theory among many people as motive for attack.
lead_paragraph: Two weeks after the attack, which killed 20 people, the authorities have remained vague on the possible motives of the perpetrators and have refused to classify it as terrorism.

headline.main: Thai Police Seize Explosives in Bangkok Bombing Investigation
headline.print_headline: Thai Police Seize Explosives in Investigation of Bangkok Bombing

snippet: Two weeks after the attack, which killed 20 people, the authorities have remained vague on the possible motives of the perpetrators and have refused to classify it as terrorism.
